boardgame.name: Space Hulk (fourth edition)
boardgame.description: From the depths of space an ancient vessel drifts slowly towards the Imperium of Mankind - a space hulk. Within its confines, untold thousands of Genestealers slowly emerge from hibernation. The Space Marines must enter the cramped corridors and tomb-like chambers of the ancient ship to defeat this alien menace._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Space Hulk is a board game for two players, recreating the battles fought between the Space Marines and Genestealers. One player commands the Space Marines as they carry out deadly missions in the ancient Space Hulk, and the other commands the horde of Genestealers opposing them. Space Hulk's fast-paced rules simulate the tense atmosphere of a mission deep inside the cramped confines of a derelict space hulk, where split-second decisions are needed for victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This new version has 4 extra missions, Boarding Torpedoes, Damage Control Room, Breach Counters (for where the Boarding Torpedoes hit or something else), and a Turbo-lift Tile allowing for multiple levels to clear of Genestealers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Also new for this edition are three mini-campaign packs released for the iPad:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Space Hulk Mission Files: Dark Angels _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Bringers of Sorrow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Space Hulk Mission Files: Ultramarines _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Duty and Honour_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Space Hulk Mission Files: Space Wolves _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Return to Kalidus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each Mini campaign comprises 3 missions specific to the chapter, and rules for creating new missions, plus a brief Chapter history._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #6: Space Hulk and New Year_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Resolutions
Episode 13: The one about our top 10 2-player games
